name: Bob the Chameleon
description:
Take the role of Bob the Chameleon and embark on a colorful quest in the middle of the savage realm of Madagascar!

  • Be the predator: catch all the bugs!
  • Avoid becoming prey, snakes and eagles are on the hunt!
  • Use your tongue to swing around, grab food, pull yourself up!
  • Hide yourself by becoming invisible to predators!

Bob the Chameleon is a colorful, old style 2D platformer game where you will play as Bob and traverse one challenging level after another. 

Platforming skills, stealth approach, secrets, skillshots: this game has everything you can ask for!

Video game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course
